messages.name: setting.arduinolistenport
messages.value: Port which listens to messages from Arduino clients.

messages.name: setting.logginginterval
messages.value: How many minutes are between sensor data loggings.

messages.name: setting.sensorcontrolinterval
messages.value: How many minutes are between sensorcontrol checks.

messages.name: setting.eventloglength
messages.value: How many lines does eventlog return.

messages.name: setting.dailyplotinterval
messages.value: How many minutes are between daily plot generating.

messages.name: setting.weeklyplotinterval
messages.value: How many minutes are between weekly plot generating.

messages.name: setting.listenport
messages.value: Which port is used to access this site. (Restart is required)
